EmailTemplate.name: Reminder Email To Candidate
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud Peritus : Gentle Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!EMS_EM_Onboarding_Request__c.EMS_EM_Last_Name__c},
Hope you're doing well!
This is a gentle reminder to complete your pre-onboarding formalities as soon as possible. This will give us the necessary time to verify your details and ensure a smooth onboarding.
If you are unable to provide any of the documents or details please reply to this mail with the reason.
Thanks for your cooperation!
Best wishes,
HR Team
Cloud Peritus.
